attributes.action: Release documents relied on to claim Covid 19 vaccines are safe and effective
attributes.additional_details:
The government have continually claimed both verbally and in writing that the Covid 19 vaccines are safe and effective.  
Recently released documents by Pfizer show efficacy and safety information that contradicts the governments claims.
For avoidance of doubt and transparency the government needs to release all data they relied upon to claim the vaccines were safe and effective.
attributes.background:
We request that the government release all documents they relied on to claim that 
The covid 19 mRNA vaccines 
1)  are safe and effective for the general public 
2) are safe and effective for pregnant women 
3) do not affect or interact with DNA in any way

rejection.details:
You can find out how to request information at

https://www.gov.uk/make-a-freedom-of-information-request

You can read more about vaccine data at

https://ukhsa.blog.gov.uk/2021/11/02/transparency-and-data-ukhsas-vaccines-report/
